data.name: NitroType Dark Theme
data.description: was gonna make this for myself but hysteria begged me so here you go...

data.name: SHAZOO.RU - NIGHT
Very Quiet Facebook
data.description:
Fork of Quiet Facebook user style. Removes stories, news feed, trending, ads. 
[And does _not_ cause Facebook to load infinitely many posts to memory.]

data.name: zhihu暗黑模式2019
data.description:
不建议白天使用，不建议强光下使用。

知乎黑暗模式，基本做到所有界面全覆盖；
顶栏自动消失；
去掉了碍眼的广告；
闲时无事更新，哪里有随着官方更新没适配到可以告诉我。

data.name: Dark NastolIO
Salty Sidebet
data.description:
A useful re-ordering of SaltyBet's containers. Perfect for having a side window of the stream, while retaining full interaction. 

Works best with 1080 height resolution, but it's easy enough to modify the "top: " values of each container if you need to.

-Fyrex on Twitch

data.name: se7ensins Dark by BamaBraves
Diary.ru new desing width 100%
data.description:
Блок постов на всю ширину в адаптивном дизайне
Добавила расстояние между постами

data.name: Dramanice (Dark)
TV Time - Dark Mode
data.description:
Check out this dark theme for TV Time!
For those who care about their eyes. No useless stuff, just elegance and simplicity.
Hope you like it :)
Your thoughts and feedback appreciated! You can let me know via the discussion section below.

Theme by eXo-Necro (eXoNecro).
